name: MemoriQR Dev
postCreateCommand: npm install && stripe --version || curl -s https://packages.stripe.dev/api/security/keypair/stripe-cli-gpg/public | gpg --dearmor | sudo tee /usr/share/keyrings/stripe.gpg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/stripe.gpg] https://packages.stripe.dev/stripe-cli-debian-local stable main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/stripe.list && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y stripe
postStartCommand: npm run dev & sleep 5 && stripe listen --forward-to localhost:3000/api/webhooks/stripe &
